h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you don’t dodge as he lands, he’ll send you into the air, grab you, and slam you repeatedly into the ground — which usually ends in instant death if you have anything less than full health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you don’t dodge as he lands, he’ll send you into the air, grab you, and slam you repeatedly into the ground — which usually ends in instant death if you have anything less than full health.
